description.text: The function getTotalMemory can be used to get the total capacity of the storage medium.
Die Funktion getTotalMemory kann verwendet werden, um die Gesamtkapazität des Speichermediums zu ermitteln.

If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality solely to authenticated users, the function SHALL check if the user that has invoked the function has the status authenticated. If the status is not authenticated, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer authentifiziert. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authenticated THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthenticated EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT authentifiziert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthenticated BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality to certain roles, the function SHALL check in the corresponding role if the (unauthenticated) user is authorized to execute the function. If the user is not authorized, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer berechtigt. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authorized THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthorized EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT autorisiert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthorized BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: The function SHALL determine the capacity of the storage medium. If the determination of the capacity of the storage medium fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorGetTotalMemoryFailed and exit the function.
Ermittelt die Gesamtkapäzität des Speichermediums. Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorGetTotalMemoryFailed, Ende.

pseudocode.text: TRY DETERMINE storage medium capacity CATCH error THROW ErrorGetTotalMemoryFailed EXIT function END
VERSUCHE ERMITTLE Speichermedium-Kapazität BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorGetTotalMemoryFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

trigger.text: The determination of storage capacity fails
Die Ermittlung der Speicherkapazität schlägt fehl

description.text: If the determination of the capacity of the storage medium has been successful, the function SHALL return the capacity of the storage medium by usage of the output parameter totalMemory. Additionally, the function SHALL return without raising an exception to indicate that the execution of the function has been successful.
Bei Erfolg der Ermittlung: Gibt Speicherkapazität via Parameter totalMemory zurück. Keine Exception.

pseudocode.text: GEBE Gesamtspeichergröße zurück (totalMemory Parameter) RETURN ohne Exception

condition.text: The determination of storage capacity has been successful

action.text: Return the storage capacity without raising an exception

description.text: the capacity of the storage medium in bytes.
die Kapazität des Speichermediums in Bytes.
